issue.message: WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE is deprecated (and is not granted) when targeting Android 13+. If you need to write to shared storage, use the `MediaStore.createWriteRequest` intent.

Hardcoded string "- Sit comfortably from your device.
- Try not to move too much when performing the test.
- Camera must be centered above or below your display.
- Click on each red dot to calibrate eye-tracker
- After model training, look at orange dots to confirm accuracy.
- Select number of videos to play, you will return here after completion.
", should use `@string` resource
issue.errorLine1:
android:text="- Sit comfortably from your device.
- Try not to move too much when performing the test.
- Camera must be centered above or below your display.
- Click on each red dot to calibrate eye-tracker
- After model training, look at orange dots to confirm accuracy.
- Select number of videos to play, you will return here after completion.
"

When you define `paddingLeft` you should probably also define `paddingRight` for right-to-left symmetry
Use "`start`" instead of "`left`" to ensure correct behavior in right-to-left locales
